long_description: A road bike that's ideal for light touring, the Novara Verita sports a streamlined 20-speed drivetrain with a gear range like a triple. Offers easy spinning on tours, commutes and long weekend rides. Butted Reynolds 520 steel frame features a relaxed road geometry to offer a smooth, comfortable ride, even on the long days. SRAM Apex group has a compact crankset paired with a wide-ranging 11-32 cassette for the easy-spinning versatility of a triple crankset without the weight or finicky shifting. Shimano long-reach caliper brakes offer confident braking. Schwalbe Marathon tires boast the GreenGuard puncture protection belt, which is made of 30% recycled products; reflective sidewalls enhance visibility for great all-around use. Full coverage fenders protect both you and the bike from wet roads and road grit. Frame and fork feature eyelets for racks (sold separately), making it easy to outfit for cargo transport or light touring. Fork also features dynamo mounting guides for an easy upgrade. Specs on the Novara Verita bike are subject to change.
